article.Heading: States push for quicker resolution on contentious E-Way Bill issue: Sources
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18 learn that states are pushing for an early implementation of the e-way bill. The goods and services tax (GST) council may discuss concerns around this at their meeting on August 5th.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18 learn that states are pushing for an early implementation of the E-Way Bill. The goods and services tax (GST) council may discuss concerns around this at their meeting on August 5th.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Timsy Jaipuria for more details.
